verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let praise arise in the midst of Thee, oh Zion. Let the praises of God be in your mouth. Let praise arise in the midst of Thee, oh Zion. Wave His banner forevermore.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For He has chosen us to be His people, A royal priesthood who worship Him. Singing praises to the King of Ages, Eternal Lord is He. Eternal Lord is He.{/lang-eng}
